welcome.title: Ask Copilot
welcome.subtitle: Get help with writing, answering questions, or generating ideas for your document.

edit-chat-title.title: New chat title
html: <input id="new-chat-title" type="text" value="{{SESSION_TITLE}}" style="width: 100%; margin-top: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: bold;" />

delete-session.title: Delete Copilot Chat session
delete-session.html: Sure you want to delete the session "{{SESSION_TITLE}}"?

sign-in.title: Sign in to GitHub Copilot
html: It has been copied to your clipboard. Please open the following link in your browser
and paste the code to sign in:
Press OK after you have completed the verification.

sign-in-request-failed.title: GitHub Copilot sign-in request failed
html: Could not send the sign-in request to GitHub Copilot.
This may be due to a network issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.

signed-in.title: Signed in to Copilot
html: You have successfully signed in to Copilot.

sign-in-verification-failed.title: GitHub Copilot sign-in verification failed
html: Failed to complete the sign-in process for GitHub Copilot.
Please ensure that you have finished the verification in your browser before clicking OK.
If the issue persists, check your internet connection and try again.

warn-nodejs-above-20-required-for-typora.title: Node.js ‚â• 20 is required to run this plugin under Typora ‚â• 1.10
html: Node.js ‚â• 20 is required to run this plugin under Typora ‚â• 1.10,
but no valid Node.js path is found.
‚â• 20 or specify Node.js path in ‚ÄúSettings ‚Üí Node.js ‚Üí Node.js path‚Äù, and restart Typora

warn-nodejs-above-20-required-for-typora.title: Node.js ‚â• 20 is required to run this plugin under Typora < 1.9
html: Node.js ‚â• 20 is required to run this plugin under Typora < 1.9,
but no valid Node.js path is found.
‚â• 20 or specify Node.js path in ‚ÄúSettings ‚Üí Node.js ‚Üí Node.js path‚Äù, and restart Typora

warn-nodejs-above-20-required-on-macOS.title: Node.js ‚â•20 is required to run this plugin
html: Node.js ‚â• 20 is required to run this plugin on macOS,
but no valid Node.js path is found.

menu.not-authorized: Your GitHub account is not subscribed to Copilot

disable-completions.label: Disable completions
disable-completions.description: Disable completions or suggestions from Copilot in Typora

use-inline-completion-text-in-source.label: Use inline completion text in source mode (Beta)
use-inline-completion-text-in-source.description: Use inline completion text in source mode instead of suggestion panel

use-inline-completion-text-in-preview-co.label: Use inline completion text in preview code blocks (Early alpha)
use-inline-completion-text-in-preview-co.description: Use inline completion text in preview code blocks instead of suggestion panel
use-inline-completion-text-in-preview-co.warning: This feature is still in early alpha and is likely to corrupt your document. Use with caution.

nodejs.title: Node.js
nodejs.note: Since Typora v1.10, Node.js ‚â• 20 is required for all platforms to run this plugin.

node-path.label: Node.js path (applied after restart)
node-path.description: Select or enter the Node.js path to use for running Copilot LSP

message.updated-auto: Updated Node.js path to auto detected path
message.warn-invalid: Failed to retrieve Node.js version for "{{PATH}}"
message.warn-invalid-version: Expected Node.js version ‚â• 20 for "{{PATH}}", but got {{VERSION}}
message.warn-empty-select-or-input: Please select or enter a valid Node.js path
message.warn-empty-input: Please enter a valid Node.js path
